hours: Monday–Saturday, 8am–6pm. Closed Sundays except for true emergencies.
summary: Handyman of Fairfax is a local handyman service for small to medium home repair and improvement projects in and around Fairfax, Virginia.
services: Drywall patching and small wall repairs
Door alignment, lock and latch fixes
Ceiling fan and light fixture installation
Simple plumbing repairs (faucets, disposals, toilets that run, minor leaks)
Deck and fence repairs (loose boards, railings)
Caulking and weatherstripping around windows and doors
Small carpentry projects and trim repairs
pricing_notes: Most visits have a one-hour minimum charge plus materials.
Smaller jobs can often be completed within the first hour.
Larger projects are quoted individually after seeing photos or a walkthrough.
Emergency or after-hours work may have an additional fee.
booking_process: Collect the caller's name, best callback number, and address or neighborhood.
Ask what they need help with and if there is any urgency or safety concern.
If possible, ask them to text or email photos after the call.
A handyman will follow up with a call or text to confirm details and schedule.

faqs.a: Yes, Springfield is within our regular service area for Handyman of Fairfax.

faqs.q: Do you handle big remodeling projects?
faqs.a: We focus on small to medium repairs and improvements. Full-scale remodels are usually referred out to partner contractors.
Same-day appointments depend on the schedule and urgency. We try to prioritize true safety issues like leaks or electrical concerns.
